programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Pasta all' amatriciana is perhaps Rome's most famous dish. Despite the fancy name, it's nothing more than long-strand pasta sauced with tomatoes, onion, bacon, and hot pepper flakes and dusted with cheese. We show you how to master this simple dish.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Osso buco, literally "bone with a hole," is the Italian term for veal shanks. This meaty cut, akin to beef shanks or lamb shanks, becomes meltingly tender when stewed for several hours in a covered pot. We serve it with a simple and satisfying polenta.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Our goal was simple: Take French onion soup and baked goat cheese salad and make stellar versions of these bistro favorites.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: A sticky bun should be neither dense nor bready, neither saturated with butter nor so sugary that it makes your heart race. The crumb should be tender and feathery and the sticky glaze gently chewy and gooey. Here's how we made ours.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Brownies are too often dull, and blondies (as well as congo bars, their coconut-flavored cousins) can be even worse, since they are even plainer. We decided to keep things simple while focusing on developing superior flavor and texture.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: The holidays are stressful enough. We created a foolproof rolled butter cookie dough that tasted great and can be turned into an array of different cookies.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Cakes baked in Bundt and tube pans are popular for a variety of reasons. These pans make cakes that are especially attractive, and the cakes themselves tend to be pretty simple to prepare. In this episode, we make angel food and a chocolate Bundt cake.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We wanted to develop the perfect pumpkin cheesecake recipe, but we never figured it would take 30 cheesecakes to develop a great recipe worthy of the finest holiday dinner.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Watch as we take two modern classic desserts —a chocolate volcano cake and caramelized pears—and make them approachable for the home cook.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Our hearty frittata is just as filling as an omelet, but a whole lot easier to prepare and serve. We also uncover the formula for the ideal quiche filling and deliver a tender, buttery pastry crust filled with moist, smooth custard.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: In this episode, we look at a few of our favorite Tex-Mex dishes: tomato salsa, quesadillas, and beef tacos.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: The test kitchen shows you how to make two hearty soups: black bean and tortilla.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: What could be more synonymous with fall than butternut squash? In this episode, we explore two main-course squash recipes: a creamy, comforting soup perfect for serving on a busy weeknight and a rich, hearty risotto suitable for entertaining.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We investigate inexpensive steaks and find out which were worth eating and how best to prepare them. We also take a look at a classic accompaniment to steak: mashed potatoes.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: When most people think of dishes like lasagna and jambalaya, they think of labor-intensive weekend meals. In this episode, however, we develop versions that could be prepared on a busy weeknight.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Two old-fashioned dishes with modern appeal: Boston baked beans and chicken and dumplings. Neither requires fancy ingredients or expensive equipment, just a little time and effort.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: What's for Sunday dinner? Around many American tables, it's meat and potatoes. Beef brisket is a good choice and a nice change from pot roast or beef stew. Although inexpensive and simple to prepare, brisket does pose some challenges to the cook.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: There are certain dinners we rely on again and again. We are particularly fond of roasting chicken and potatoes together in one pan. While the chicken roasts, its juices drip onto the potatoes, giving them a wonderfully rich crust and creamy flavor.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Thanksgiving can strike fear into the heart of even the most proficient cook. However with our turkey and sweet potato casserole recipes, we minimize the work so that the cook can enjoy the holiday as much as everyone else.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We develop a foolproof preparation for pork chops with vinegar and peppers—a modern version tangy and juicy enough to rival that prepared by an Italian grandmother. Next, we turn to pan-roasted pork tenderloin.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Tuna, which is often served rare to medium-rare, can be particularly tricky to get just right with a nicely seared crust. As for halibut, we developed a technique that ensured perfect texture without a loss of flavor.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Some people are intimidated by the thought of preparing fish. Traditional dishes, like Fish Meunière, can seem even more daunting. But you don't need to be wearing a toque to prepare this French classic well.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Most Italian recipes seem startlingly easy to prepare, requiring just a few simple ingredients. But some dishes need special care to reach their full potential. In this episode, we demystify two Italian classics: Fettuccine Alfredo and Beef in Barolo.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: In this episode, we prepare an Indian-inspired shrimp curry and a Thai-inspired green curry with chicken.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: When you eat chicken frequently, it pays to have a number of preparations on hand. In this episode, we turn to orange-flavored chicken and chicken teriyaki.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: One of our favorite Spanish dishes is paella. But with a lengthy ingredient list the shopping alone can give the home cook pause. We take a hard look at paella to see if we can pare back this dish to its humble origins without losing its alluring flavors.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We set out to develop a hassle-free pizza recipe especially for the grill—one we hope will become a new backyard barbecue favorite.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC se sorprende cuando Hotch es arrestado por un equipo SWAT y por sospecha de conspiración, mientras el equipo se apresura a demostrar su inocencia, sospechan que se avecina un complot mayor.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Fe
programme.desc: Cuando el hijo alistado de un coronel retirado convertido en predicador aparece muerto, el equipo cree que puede ser víctima de un crimen de odio. Mientras tanto, el padre de Gibbs viene de visita por vacaciones.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Ignición
programme.desc: Cuando un piloto de la Marina es encontrado muerto en extrañas circunstancias en una zona aislada, el equipo se encuentra luchando contra un abogado sin escrúpulos con una agenda oculta.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Asuntos familiares
programme.desc: Gibbs cuestiona la capacidad de DiNozzo para hacer su trabajo cuando el mayor de los DiNozzo se involucra en su última investigación, en el episodio 150 de NCIS.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: París
programme.desc: Cuando la testigo estrella del gobierno en un caso de malversación es objetivo de un asesino, depende del equipo ayudarla a llegar a casa con vida.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): La verdad sobre mentir
programme.desc: Danny y Baez investigan la muerte de una adolescente empujada al metro. Frank se molesta por la supervisión del nuevo Inspector General en el NYPD.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Desaparecida
programme.desc: Danny y Baez sospechan que una niña podría ser víctima de secuestro, pero su madre lo niega, aunque su historia no cuadra. Mientras, Frank visita a un sacerdote, consejero del NYPD, arrestado por conducir ebrio.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Músculo
programme.desc: Jamie es cuestionado por la muerte de un pandillero que perseguía. Baez se infiltra para investigar al prometido de la ex de Danny, quien vende drogas desde su gimnasio.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Apuestas mortales
programme.desc: Un oficial es acusado de usar fuerza excesiva, lo que pone al departamento bajo escrutinio. Danny y Maria investigan el asesinato de un corredor de valores endeudado.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: El equipo es cuestionado por un Comité del Senado a raíz de la pérdida de Prentiss. Mientras, una cara familiar regresa de forma inesperada para ayudar al equipo a con este caso.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC es llamada a Oklahoma cuando unas mujeres están siendo asesinadas, después de ser torturadas con ácido sulfúrico.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC investiga un asesinato masivo en una empresa de seguridad de Internet en las cercanías de Charlottesville, pero las pistas revelan que no es un asesino en serie normal.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: El equipo UAC viaja a Idaho, donde un asesino en serie fija como objetivo a los sobrevivientes de la masacre de la secundaria Boise de hace 10 años.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: París
programme.desc: Cuando la testigo estrella del gobierno en un caso de malversación es objetivo de un asesino, depende del equipo ayudarla a llegar a casa con vida.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A personalized keychain casts doubt on a man’s flimsy story. A cyclist throws something behind his back as soon as deputies roll up. A laid-back driver’s estimation of what’s in his car is off by a couple trash bags.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An alleged burglar claims his sack full of money is a gift from his grandma. The discovery of a pink bandana leads deputies to question a suspect’s story. A deputy attempts to get a man to cool off after a fight with his wife.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A deputy questions a driver about why his broken-down car looks like it’s been in an accident. Obstacle after obstacle prevents a woman from fixing her janky vehicle. A young man looking for a fresh start falls on hard times.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Two men acting strangely in a gas station draw the suspicion of an employee. Deputies arrest a man for creating an unsafe environment for his younger brother. Mom calls the cops when her daughter throws water on her.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: The rough terrain of a high-speed pursuit proves both dangerous and useful for deputies. Police find more than a stolen air conditioner in the trunk of a messy van. A confused man loses track of what’s in his pockets.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A runaway biker makes multiple clumsy attempts to slip away from deputies. A shady figure has a curious method of trying to get a drink of water. A young woman starts making unwise choices when her family leaves town.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man in possession of a stolen car explains his unique nickname to deputies. Police go to the same house twice in under 30 minutes to sort out a messy marital spat. A mom with multiple priors is caught in a bind.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A deputy tries to level with a man who’s struggled with addiction for a decade. Security guards at an aquarium warn officers about a man with a gun. A masked-up cyclist has no luck out-pedaling the officer on his tail.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: After leading police on a slow pursuit, a sharply-dressed driver has a heated talk with another deputy. In spite of her tears, police unravel a woman’s lies one-by-one. A traditionally bad omen turns into good luck for a couple.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A traffic stop turns dangerous when a driver takes off with a deputy halfway inside the vehicle. Recent changes in the law and a forthright attitude help a man avoid jail time. A neighborhood man gives motorists a scare.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A biker with a history of stealing vehicles doesn’t know how to drive his motorcycle. A man in- between jobs takes up a sketchy method of earning money. Deputies strongly question the legitimacy of a man’s work van.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A business owner flags down officers when an erratic man starts climbing on his car. Unusual circumstances allow officers to cut a driver some slack for being honest. A man forgets to return a car after running errands.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A suspect on the run makes a dangerous decision when he finds himself cornered. An unsuspecting driver gets more than she bargained for when she gives an old friend a lift. A friendly woman has a thing for cowboys.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A teenager who ran away from home tries running from the cops too. A man set a date to turn his life around, but deputies ask him to start earlier. A man found with hundreds of sunglasses claims he was going to give them away.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police deploy spike strips to put an end to a dangerous stolen vehicle pursuit. An alleged mechanic says he has permission to drive a semi-truck — the owner says otherwise. A couple stops a woman from driving away in their car.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: When the cuffs come out, an emotional cyclist gives deputies the runaround. A boyfriend’s honesty saves his girlfriend from going to jail on her birthday. Police investigate a case of road rage involving a possible gun.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A runaway cyclist dips into a house to catch his breath. A deputy tries to cut a man some slack despite his mistakes. The owners of an empty house call the police when they hear someone else inside.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A pair of suspects on the run pretend they were busy napping. A man reaches for something in his pocket, but denies knowing what it is. A family calls the police after their roommate brandishes a gun.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A deputy tries to cut a guy some slack after his relationship troubles got out of hand. A teenager gets a serious lesson in not drinking while underage. A couple is forced to take a raincheck on their wedding day.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: During a traffic stop, a driver drops off his passenger before speeding away. Deputies are amazed when a man offers them an ID that looks nothing like him. Deputies investigate a case of road rage involving a gun.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man with multiple felony warrants gets one last taste of freedom before heading to prison. A speeding driver is arrested for the same thing he was arrested for the day before. A runaway suspect leaves a trail behind him.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A very cooperative car thief tells deputies all about his good fortune. An argument over business leaves one man on the ground with a bloody mouth. The occupants of a truck are oblivious to what deputies find in the backseat.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A cyclist allegedly mistakes a deputy for a thief and tries to escape into the bushes. Police cut a dad some slack by not towing the family car. Two sisters catch the police’s attention when they take their spat to the road.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An elderly driver sacrifices his own van during his desperate escape attempt. A traffic stop on a suspended driver turns up more than anticipated. Several car occupants learn it’s better to tell the truth from the start.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Deputies gradually get to the bottom of a possible stolen vehicle. A woman asks the police to help her make a clean break from bad habits. A single woman tries to plan a date with an online suitor, but the night quickly goes awry.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A family gets a huge scare when a fleeing suspect finds his way into their house. Police sort out a chaotic argument between two childhood friends. A woman in a suspicious vehicle plays fast and loose with the truth.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: The owner of a stolen truck calls officers when he spots it in a nearby alley. A fleeing driver leads officers on a wild chase over a closed bridge. Police track down a suspect who gave a liquor store employee a phony $100 bill.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When a porn producer and drug dealer are found dead in an upscale Vegas area, the CSIs focus their investigation on members of the neighborhood.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When two office mates plot to rob a casino, their plan ends with the CSIs investigating a murder.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When a policeman kills another officer, the CSIs must look to the evidence to determine if the shooting was premeditated or an accident.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: An entire college football team comes under investigation when their beloved coach is found murdered in his home.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Two seemingly unrelated crimes tracked by the CSIs turn out to be connected by a twisted plot of revenge.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Langston continues to search for a young girl taken hostage as part of a human trafficking operation.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: An unusual piece of evidence revealed during a bowling tournament brings the CSIs to intestigate a murder at a bowling alley.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When Nick, Greg and Hodges take Henry to celebrate his birthday at a biker bar, they uncover a double homicide and find several suspects still at the bar who may be the murderers.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A major shootout at a gun store may be connected to the death of a young woman involved in a suicide pact.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Two beautiful women are murdered in a Las Vegas hotel and the CSIs uncover an unusual killer during their investigation.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The CSI team delves into the world of professional golf when the body of a legendary player is discovered during a high-profile tournament.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The case of two high school students, one dead and one missing, lead the CSIs into the underbelly of streetcar racing and a tangled web of deadly competition.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Rascal Flatts takes center stage when a band member is electrocuted by his own guitar during a concert, the CSI team investigates if it was a case of foul play.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When a young boy is found murdered, the CSI team uncovers evidence that may link his death to an old case that recently resurfaced.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando un productor de pornografía y un traficante de drogas son encontrados muertos en un área exclusiva de Las Vegas, el equipo de CSI centra su investigación en los miembros del vecindario.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando dos compañeros de oficina conspiran para robar un casino, su plan termina con los CSI investigando un asesinato.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando un policía mata a otro oficial, el CSI debe buscar las pruebas para determinar si el tiroteo fue premeditado o un accidente.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Todo un equipo de fútbol universitario es investigado cuando su querido entrenador es encontrado asesinado en su casa.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando dos crímenes aparentemente diferentes resultan estar vinculados, los CSIs descubren que están entrelazadas parte de la trama.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Tercera y última parte del crossover CSI, en el que el equipo de CSI de Langston ayuda a investigar una red de prostitución que puede haber albergado a un rehén que Langston ha estado buscando en Miami y Nueva York.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Una prueba inusual revelada durante un torneo de bolos lleva al equipo de CSI a investigar un asesinato en un boliche.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando Nick, Greg y Hodges llevan a Henry a celebrar su cumpleaños a un bar de motociclistas, descubren un doble homicidio y encuentran a varios sospechosos todavía en el bar que pueden ser los asesinos.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Un gran tiroteo en una tienda de armas puede estar relacionado con la muerte de una mujer joven involucrada en un pacto suicida.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Dos hermosas mujeres son asesinadas en un hotel de Las Vegas y los CSI descubren a un asesino inusual durante su investigación.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: El equipo de CSI se adentra en el mundo del golf profesional cuando se descubre el cuerpo de un jugador legendario durante un torneo de alto nivel.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: El caso de dos estudiantes de secundaria, uno muerto y el otro desaparecido, llevan a los CSI a unas carreras callejeras de coches y a su complicada red de competición mortal.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Rascal Flatts toma el centro del escenario cuando un miembro de la banda es electrocutado por su propia guitarra durante un concierto, el equipo de CSI investiga si fue un asesinato.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando un niño pequeño es encontrado asesinado, el equipo de CSI descubre evidencia que puede vincular su muerte con un viejo caso que resurgió recientemente.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio faces a former nemesis who escaped his grasp once before, a case of stolen identity leads to murder, the question becomes "which one did it?"

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Florida's gator and snake-infested Everglades becomes ground zero for a number of unrelated murders just as fires engulf the rare eco-system.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Florida's gator and snake-infested Everglades becomes ground zero for a number of unrelated murders just as fires engulf the rare eco-system.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a small jet crashes into a residential neighborhood, the wreckage reveals a corpse in the cargo hold, along with a half-million dollars in cash.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The world of extreme skateboard videos turns deadly when the competition heats up inside the studio. Horatio and the CSI team investigate.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Tax season gets off to a bang when two IRS agents turn up dead. Horatio Caine and the CSI Team are called in to investigate.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: South Beach Miami’s sexiest nightclub becomes a hotbed of revenge when murder closes the doors on a unique dating service.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: An eight-year-old girl becomes the innocent pawn in an ugly and abusive game that ends in murder. Horatio and the CSI team investigate.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A high school reunion turns deadly when a classmate acts on a 15-year-old grudge, Horatio and Yelina discover that Ray may still be alive.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The CSI Team works against a ticking clock to find the purported accomplice in a years-old ax-murder case before the convicted killer is executed.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The CSI team races against time to locate and deactivate a radioactive bomb set to go off in the middle of downtown Miami.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio and the CSI team face off with Miami’s notorious and deadly Mala Noche gang after a funeral becomes the scene of a murder.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A family boating accident reveals a sinister plot by grifters to heist 10 million dollars in gold bars. Horatio and the CSI team investigate.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a teenage girl partying in Miami on her way to the Bahamas with her high school class.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Una violación de domicilio se vuelve mucho más que eso cuando Horatio Caine y el equipo de CSI descubren que son el blanco de la mafia rusa.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando la vida de un niño inocente está en peligro, Ryan, a la larga, se ve obligado a traicionar a Horatio Caine y al resto del equipo de CSI.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Un caso de asesinato que involucra cirugía plástica extrema conduce a Horatio Caine hasta Ron Saris, que está vivo y busca vengarse de Julia.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando una estrella de telerrealidad es asesinada, Horatio Caine y el equipo de CSI se adentran en el mundo escandaloso y sensual de un programa de televisión de citas.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio Caine y el equipo de CSI trabajan para averiguar por qué una familia aparentemente normal fue blanco de un brutal ataque con granadas.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: El equipo de CSI investiga el caso de un hombre hervido vivo, Julia se descontrola y uno de los secretos más oscuros del equipo sale a la luz.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio lucha para salvar a Yelina y cuando Delko se opone a la súplica de Calleigh y ayuda a su peligroso padre, su vida corre peligro.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Mientras la vida de Delko pende de un hilo, Horatio vuelve 12 años en el tiempo para revelar cómo se conocieron y se convirtieron en un equipo los CSI de Miami.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando atacan el laboratorio, Horatio debe atender la única solicitud de un hombre armado para salvar a cinco rehenes, incluido el nuevo CSI Jesse Cardoza.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Tres jugadores de vóleibol caen muertos misteriosamente en la cancha mientras el testimonio de Calleigh contra Delko amenaza su futuro como CSI.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando el hombre más odiado de Miami es asesinado, Horatio Caine y el equipo de CSI van a la caza de su asesino y su tesoro escondido.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Alexx Woods y Eric Delko regresan para ayudar a Horatio Caine y al equipo de CSI a detener un brote viral mortal en la hermosa Miami.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio Caine y el equipo de CSI recrean una noche de libertinaje de una despedida de soltero para resolver un asesinato y encontrar a un novio desaparecido.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio Caine llama al Dr. Ray Langston del equipo de CSI de Las Vegas para que venga a Miami cuando se descubre una pierna amputada en los Everglades.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The CSI New York based team investigates the bizarre murder of a scientist, as well as the unusual death of a college girl.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The CSI team investigates a string of murders in New York that revolve around an online world, apparently performed by a hit man.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The CSIs investigate two eerie murders on Halloween; one, an apparent zombie attack, the other a faked murder/suicide in a house with a spooky past.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The CSI team works to solve two seemingly unrelated murders that after investigations are underway turn out to be connected.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The CSI team investigates crimes: one involving a model that was killed on a billboard in Times Square, and another centered around a robbery.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The CSI team investigates the murder of a groom on his wedding day and the appearance of a mysterious box on the hood of Stella’s car.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac travels to Chicago in order to solve the mystery of the 333 caller while the rest of the CSI team works on a murder in a subway car.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The CSI team investigates the death of a wealthy man in a hip nightclub and the inadvertent shooting of a young boy during a robbery.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The CSI team investigates the murder of the owner of a posh hotel as well as the death of a teenager that seems to be connected to Peter Pan.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: After a young woman and a prominent judge are murdered, the CSI team works to discover the connection between the two crimes.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The CSI team investigates the death of a street luger and the mysterious drowning of a woman in a self-sanitizing pay bathroom.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: When a trained female assassin comes to New York City, she really puts the CSI New York team members’ abilities to the test.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The kidnapping of a little girl and a fire set to her apartment building leaves CSI New York team member Stella feeling guilty and homeless.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: A shark washes up on shore unloading a dead body and a bizarre crime scene that leaves the CSI New York team more than puzzled.

programme.title: CSI: New York: A toda marcha (S6 Ep 7)
programme.desc: Un miembro del equipo de CSI de las Vegas, Ray Langston, llega a Nueva York para ayudar a Mac y a su equipo a intentar salvar a un rehén de una red de trata de personas.

programme.title: CSI: New York: El nido del Cucú (S6 Ep 8)
programme.desc: El equipo de CSI de Nueva York reanuda su búsqueda del Asesino de la Brújula después de que un cuerpo cae del puente de la calle 59.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Solsticio de Manhattan (S6 Ep 9)
programme.desc: En la culminación de un misterio de varios episodios, el equipo de CSI de Nueva York descubre la oscura guarida del Asesino de la Brújula.

programme.title: CSI: New York: La casa de la muerte (S6 Ep 10)
programme.desc: El equipo de CSI de Nueva York realiza un seguimiento de una llamada a Emergencias que lo lleva a un ático vacío, pero encuentra un cadáver de casi 100 años y una casa con trampas explosivas.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Segundas oportunidades (S6 Ep 11)
programme.desc: Encuentran a un drogadicto rehabilitado muerto en un callejón y el equipo de CSI de Nueva York descubre que él fue víctima de un complot premeditado.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Justicia criminal (S6 Ep 12)
programme.desc: Cuando el equipo de CSI investiga un brutal apuñalamiento, descubre que se colocaron pruebas en la escena del crimen y eso los enfrenta a un colega de confianza.

programme.title: Prueba de amor

programme.title: La niñera y el presidente

programme.desc: Un aristócrata arruinado casa a su hija con un rico ranchero para no caer en la pobreza, sin saber que este es más astuto que ellos y los pone a trabajar duro en el campo.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Se descubrió un esqueleto humano en las marismas de Carolina del Norte y, cuando los investigadores descubrieron que había estado muerta durante 18 meses, sabían que sería difícil descubrir quién era, y mucho más quién la mató.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Acechado en la noche

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Dentro de un cabello
programme.desc: Una mirada retrospectiva al caso del violador de River Park, que asaltó a cuatro mujeres en South Bend, Indiana, durante 1996. Los agentes del orden arrestaron a Richard Alexander, quien fue declarado culpable en 1998 y sentenciado a 70 años de prisión.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Los doctores del hospital no pudieron determinar la causa de las alucinaciones y el intenso dolor de Bobby Curley. Lo trataron como un trastorno neurológico pero su estado se deterioró. Él estaba siendo envenenado.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Después de que el sospechoso fuera declarado culpable de incendio premeditado y asesinato, mantuvo su inocencia pero fue sentenciado a 25 años de prisión.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Edward Post preparó un baño para su esposa antes de salir a correr. Regresó y la encontró sin respirar. Murió antes de que llegara la ambulancia. La policía consideró su muerte como accidental hasta que surgió un motivo.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Destinado a la cárcel
programme.desc: Una mujer es encontrada muerta en un barranco, pero las fuertes tormentas habían arrastrado pruebas cruciales de la escena del crimen. En dos ocasiones, el rastro se estancó.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Uno para llevar
programme.desc: Una pareja casada decidió escapar del frío del invierno con unas minivacaciones en Key West.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Los doctores no saben por qué un científico joven se ha enfermado muy gravemente. Cuando las pruebas revelan finalmente la causa, es muy tarde para salvarlo.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: La investigación sobre un brutal ataque a dos niños cerca de un estanque se basa en pruebas extraídas de las aguas turbias. Fue el primer caso en el que se utilizó evidencia de Diatomea (algas) para ubicar a un sospechoso en la escena del crimen.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Voto de silencio

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1988, cuando un paciente muere inesperadamente en el consultorio del neurólogo de California, Richard Boggs, la policía comienza lo que creen que será una investigación de rutina.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Asesino cereal

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Pedido fatal

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: A Prueba de Fuego
programme.desc: Un pirómano en serie inicia varios incendios que causan daños por un valor de millones de dólares y la muerte de tres personas. Él es descubierto, en parte, mediante el uso de hipnosis forense.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: A cenar y ver una película
programme.desc: La hora de la muerte se vuelve fundamental después de que se encuentra asesinada a una mujer embarazada en su habitación con aire acondicionado.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Dave is determined to spend time with Alli and win back her trust. Just as he’s beginning to make headway, Dave’s one-night stand, Jacinta, aggressively pushes her way back into his life, making it impossible for Dave to ignore her.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Dave is determined to spend time with Alli and win back her trust. Just as he’s beginning to make headway, Dave’s one-night stand, Jacinta, aggressively pushes her way back into his life, making it impossible for Dave to ignore her.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Bianca is stoked when Katie agrees to help her with her university applications…until she suspects her new “friend” is using her to source painkillers. As Katie’s downward spiral continues, Bianca and Drew become closer.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Bianca is stoked when Katie agrees to help her with her university applications…until she suspects her new “friend” is using her to source painkillers. As Katie’s downward spiral continues, Bianca and Drew become closer.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Fiona and Imogen scheme to end Marisol’s Student Council reign. The plan? Throw an unforgettable end-of-semester Degrassi holiday carnival. But with a huge family crisis looming, Fiona worries she may have over-promised.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Fiona and Imogen scheme to end Marisol’s Student Council reign. The plan? Throw an unforgettable end-of-semester Degrassi holiday carnival. But with a huge family crisis looming, Fiona worries she may have over-promised.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: As Degrassi students head back to class, Drew decides the time is right to break up with Katie. Clare returns from the break excited to reconnect with Eli, but does he feel the same way?

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After blacking out, Drew tries to piece together what happened at the party. Clare's new internship means she has less time for Eli, but they can still make it work… right? Maya embarrasses herself at a band audition.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When Katie's anger at Drew boils over, she searches for a way to make him suffer. Eli clashes with Becky while planning Degrassi's next play. Meanwhile, a new guy catches Tristan's eye.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Drew feels like his life is falling apart. Is he upset about losing Bianca, or is something bigger going on? While casting the play, Eli and Becky work to resolve their creative differences.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Zig tries to hide the fact that he's poor from Tori. When Eli shares his vision for the musical, Dave isn’t sure he has what it takes to play Romeo. Fiona returns to Degrassi, thrilled to see her girlfriend.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Zig will do anything to impress Tori… even steal. Fiona wants Imogen to define their relationship: Are they a couple or not? The hockey team teases Dave about his role in the play.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When Alli is offered a scholarship to MIT, her parents are bursting with pride -- but is it the right choice? Meanwhile, Jake decides college isn't for him.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Alli makes a difficult choice about her future. With a little help from Katie, Jake tries to prove himself to his father. Cam snaps at Maya before a big game.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Jenna bonds with Becky -- and Becky's hot brother, Luke -- but will religious differences come between them? Clare obsesses over her journalism mentor, Asher. Drew is offered a job.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Jenna gets baptized, but did she do it for the wrong reasons? Drew is failing his classes, and considers dropping out of Degrassi. Connor's tweets embarrass Clare in front of Asher.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Clare tries to impress Asher by pitching a story about Romeo and Jules. K.C. and Bianca play matchmaker for K.C.'s mom. Katie chaperones Maya's date with Cam.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: A secret is eating away at Clare, but will facing the truth make things worse for her? K.C.'s mom has some surprising news. Meanwhile, Maya tries to impress Cam.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Cam needs a break from hockey, so he blows off practice to hang out with Maya. K.C.'s dad is release from jail, but is he ready to have him back in the picture? Fiona's loft is a disaster, and she blames her new roommate -- Drew.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Cam struggles to live up to everyone's expectations on the ice. K.C. wants his dad out of his life -- even if it means doing something drastic. Drew and Fiona try to work out their differences.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Imogen designs an elaborate set for Romeo and Jules, and reaches out to her estranged mother for the money to build it. Meanwhile, Becky interferes with ticket sales.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Imogen worries about her dad's strange behavior. Becky bonds with Adam without realizing that he's transgender. Katie and Jake realize they have feelings for each other -- but where does that leave Mike Dallas?

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Clare writes an article that stirs up trouble at school and makes her a new enemy -- Mike Dallas. Tori, Tristan, and Dave compete in a talent contest. Drew feels distant from Bianca, so he goes on a spending spree.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Eli organizes a surprise birthday party to cheer Clare up, and starts to suspect that she's hiding something. Audra urges Drew to go back to Degrassi. Dave worries that he and Alli are growing apart.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When a group of parents try to stop the play, Eli takes action. As opening night approaches, Tristan realizes that if he doesn't find a boyfriend fast, his first kiss will be onstage -- with Dave. Meanwhile, Becky wants to "save" Adam.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: On opening night for Romeo and Jules, Tristan is nowhere to be found. Is it stage fright -- or something worse? While Eli is busy with the play, Clare decides to get even with Asher.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: As Becky begins to fall for Adam, she worries how her conservative parents will react.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Rick decides to get back at his bullies, hitting them right where it hurts – their cars. But when Jimmy becomes a member of the “Whack Your Brain” team, the two form a truce.

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: The earth split in India 66 million years ago in a disaster that may have caused the end of the dinosaurs.

programme.title: Prehistoric Autopsy
programme.desc: Anatomist Professor Alice Roberts and biologist Dr George McGavin go on an extraordinary evolutionary journey to meet our ancient ancestors. They start with our closest prehistoric relative, a Neanderthal.

programme.title: Prehistoric Autopsy
programme.desc: The team go back 1.5 million years to meet one of the earliest humans, Homo erectus. They walked the earth far longer than any other human species and were the first ancestors to look a lot like we do today.

programme.title: Prehistoric Autopsy
programme.desc: The team looks at probably the most famous of all our early ancestors. She is called Lucy from the species Australopithecus afarensis and she lived 3.2 million years ago. Lucy's species had traded life in the trees for life on the ground.

programme.title: Ice Age Giants
programme.desc: Discover the beasts of the Ice Age with Professor Alice Roberts. Alice's adventure begins in the Land of the Sabre-tooth.

programme.title: Ice Age Giants
programme.desc: Alice ventures to the parts of the northern hemisphere hit hardest by the cold - Europe and Siberia. High in the mountains of Transylvania, a cave sealed for thousands of years reveals grisly evidence of a fight to the death.

programme.title: Ice Age Giants
programme.desc: Professor Alice Roberts journeys 40,000 years back in time on the trail of the great beasts of the ice age. This was the last time that giants like mammoths, woolly rhinos and sabre-toothed cats ruled our planet.

programme.title: Wildlife on One
programme.desc: A look at extraordinary animals around the world, emphasising their unpredictable behaviour.

programme.title: Wildlife on One
programme.desc: Fossil remains serve as clues in discovering how prehistoric flying creatures lived.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: In a time when monstrous creatures ruled the earth, South America was the land of the giants. Nigel Marven walks among these gigantic creatures, on a quest to witness the largest predator bringing down the largest prey.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Nigel Marven journeys back to the sand dunes of Mesozoic Mongolia to track the owner of the largest claws of all time, the Therizinosaurus. His adventure yields a series of surprising clues, a nest, footprints, dung, and more.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Scientists study the perfectly preserved remains of an adolescent allosaurus they call Big Al.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: This scientific detective story traces the evidence for Big Al the allosaur's existence, using clues from climate change studies, forensics, and fossil records to bring him back to life.

programme.title: Attenborough and the Giant Dinosaur
programme.desc: David Attenborough tells the story of the discovery and reconstruction in Argentina of the world's largest known dinosaur, a brand new species of titanosaur. Measuring 37m long, it now holds the record as the biggest animal ever to walk the earth.

programme.title: The Making Of: Walking With Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Animatronics, computer animation and science re-create the dinosaurs' world.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs: Shortbites
programme.desc: Featured species are the coelophysis and the diplodocus.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who
programme.desc: The creature from the caves, wounded and dangerous, is on the loose on Wenley Moor.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor attempts to make peace between the humans and Silurians.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Silurian's infect Major Baker with a virus and release him to spread the infection.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who
programme.desc: As the Silurian plague quickly spreads, the Doctor desperately searches for a cure.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Silurians intend to destroy the Earth's protective Van Allen Belt, destroying mankind.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor arrives in London to discover the city is completely deserted.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor captures a dinosaur to solve the mystery of the invasion.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Time Lords send the Doctor, Sarah and Harry to a time shortly before the creation of the Daleks.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor finds that some of Davros's fellow Kaleds are unhappy with the development of the Daleks.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor informs the Kaled government of Davros's experiments and they move to shut down the bunker.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who
programme.desc: When the Kaled dome is destroyed, the war appears to be over and the Thals rejoice at their victory.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who
programme.desc: Davros interrogates the Doctor, forcing him to reveal the future of the Daleks.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Kaled elite move to prevent the development of the Daleks while the Doctor hopes to destroy them forever.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor and his companions arrive in a London very different from what they remember.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor and Ian are captured and taken to the Dalek ship.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who
programme.desc: Hiding on board the Dalek spaceship, Ian is taken to the mines of Bedfordshire.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor, Susan and David discover a nearby firebomb, left by Robomen to destroy London.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who
programme.desc: Ian and his friend Larry are chased by the Slyther, protecting the Bedfordshire mines.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who
programme.desc: Barbara realizes how to control the Robomen and orders an attack on the Daleks.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor and Jo land on a spaceship in the far future.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who
programme.desc: Neither the humans or the Draconians are willing to believe the Doctor.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who
programme.desc: Something is wrong with Castrovalva, but the Portreeve cannot help.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who
programme.desc: Accused of being spies, the Doctor is sentenced to imprisonment.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor and Jo are the Master's prisoners.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who
programme.desc: On Draconia, the Doctor reveals the Master's plan to provoke war.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who
programme.desc: Arriving on Earth, the Doctor, Harry and Sarah meet a group of stranded human colonists.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who
programme.desc: Sarah has been captured by Styre who is conducting experiments on the captured humans.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who
programme.desc: Davros is held captive aboard a prison in space.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Young fans Jessica and Rachel join Cesar as he deals with a tiny dog with an outsized personality and a nervous pit bull mix afraid of the sea.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps owners of rescue dogs including a terrier mix that screams and a Belgian Tervuren scared of her own home; Cesar helps a family adopting their first dog.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar travels to the U.K. to help troubled dog owners with a territorial street dog and a dalmatian whose personality can turn ugly.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A terrier rescued via the Internet is a handful to manage and bites anyone who tries to touch his hindquarters; pit bull problems.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A family's German shepherd will only listen to one person; a Brittany spaniel becomes aggressive around female dogs.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A family deals with a stray dog who bites; Daisy Fuentes has trouble controlling her English bulldog.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A dog barks all the time and might pose a threat to children; a beagle mix has lots of strange behaviors.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A herding dog likes to bite the noses of horses; a family struggles with a dog who runs out the door as soon as it is opened.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps Lucy, an odd dalmatian who is affectionate one minute and angry the next and Lizzie who is obsessed with running all the time.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar has his hands full with a Labrador that is obsessed with water and a Chihuahua with a penchant for biting legs.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A human psychologist calls Cesar for help when her pet pug and pet pig fight; an emotionally scarred German shepherd.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A dog with a dark side has a knack for stalking and killing small animals; a poodle chases cars; a bulldog has an adverse reaction to skateboarders.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A rescued dog is too ferocious; an insane Great Dane upsets a household; playing matchmaker for a lonely but picky boxer.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Pets abandoned during Hurricane Katrina reunite with their owners or find new homes; a pit bull behaves aggressively toward the dog of his owner's new girlfriend; a large dog has pica.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Rottweilers with behavior problems; a small mixed-breed fails two obedience classes; a vizsla needs help adjusting to a move from the country to the city.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Doberman mix instigates fights at the dog park; a Pomeranian charges other dogs; an aggressive terrier mix.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Actress Denise Richards needs help getting in control of her three dogs; a miniature pinscher bites visitors; a lazy basset hound.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Beth designs a luxurious new office for the team and shows it off to Dog, but the bounty hunter is more interested in starting his hunt for Federico, who's been revoked for missing court dates and generally running amuck.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog goes on his a case, which involves Bobby, who's been on parole for three months pending sentencing on an assault charge. Bobby's girlfriend wants him back in jail, and Dog agrees that the Bobby needs to be behind bars.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog pursues two people whose lives have been ruined by drugs. First, he tracks Mae, who traded a good home and loving family for an ice pipe. The next case involves Jude. His addiction has caused his pregnant wife to fear for her safety.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is a rough, tough bounty hunter, but he's a softie at heart, as the two cases in this episode show.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog answers two very different calls for help from women. In the first case, he helps Leland protect Maria, who's being threatened by her violent husband. Then Dog visit a young woman who's dying and has asked to see Dog as one of her final wishes.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Baby Lyssa, who's just turned 18 and is studying to become a bondsman, gets to do some on-the-job training when she helps Dog hunt for Wayne, who's run out on a bond for second-degree assault.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is sick as a dog, but he still must lead the hunt for a fugitive named James. James' girlfriend tries to cover for him, but Dog surprises James in his bedroom and leads him away in cuffs.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Beth buys Dog a shirt with an embroidered chicken, but Dog explains he only wears shirts with pictures of either Jesus or a Harley-Davidson. When it's time to go to work, the team goes after Necia, a fugitive with felony charges pending.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: It's Christmas day, and Dog sets out to nab Raymond, who robs to support his ice habit, and give him a little Christmas gift - shiny new handcuffs.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and Beth must go after their former housekeeper, Lisa, who's jumped bond. They know this case will be tricky because Lisa knows everyone in the family. Luckily, Beth's nephew, Jason, is visiting and is quickly put to work as the bait.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Before Tim heads out for a tough day of bounty hunting, he likes to get in a little quality time with his daughter, Summer Rain.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: After giving a rousing speech to an audience of enthusiastic grade-schoolers, Dog catches up with an old friend, Sheriff Tommy Cayetano, to talk business. Dog's got a tough fugitive, named Mia, to catch and Tommy is happy to lend a hand.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog knows very little about Peter, but what he does know, he doesn't like! Not only is he currently facing two counts of second degree sexual assault, about week ago, he dropped out of sight before missing his court date.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: It's the day before Valentine's Day and love is in the air at Da Kine Bail Bonds--but not for Tapi who has failed to appear in court on theft charges. Dog's plan is to have Leland knock on Tapi's door with a Valentine's gift to draw her out.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and Beth are finally getting married! They've been together for more than ten years, but Dog is determined, as he puts it, to "marry his common law wife the Christian way."

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog, Beth are off to the Big Island for their wedding. They hope to relax for a few days but it turns out Leland has a fugitive he needs to catch and despite the time limit, neither Dog nor Beth can resist the opportunity to catch a fugitive.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and the team must deal with misleading informants, belligerent boaters, and angry drunks when they go after Kimberly, a traffic offender with over 20 violations. And if that isn't enough, Dog has another problem -- Duane Lee is sick.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: When the team hunts for Steven, a fugitive with a history of domestic abuse, they seek help from his girlfriend, who's been a victim of his abuse. Meanwhile, Beth trains for a 5K race to help raise awareness about domestic abuse.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is going to be the keynote speaker at the annual Profession Bail Agents convention in Las Vegas, but before he leaves he's got to clear two cases from his docket--Heidi and Stephanie.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Tim's got a big problem. Owen has failed to appear in court. He's on bond for serious drug charges and now Tim could lose $30,000 if he doesn't catch Owen. With Dog's help he tries to track down the co-signer but they come up dry.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: It's been raining for days and the team is going a little stir-crazy, but Dog has the cure; a good hunt. Maui has failed to appear on a drug charge and the team has just one lead. She was recently spotted during a bust at a local chop shop garage.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog decides it's time to outfit the Da Kine crew with new SUVs. After a quick visit to their local dealership, they go after Jasmine, a woman whose criminal record includes over 37 arrests for everything from drug promotion to assault.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog has two fugitives to catch, and he gets help from the unlikeliest sources--the fugitives' mothers. First, Ginger's mother wants to revoke her daughter's bond. Then Brandon's mother decides to revoke his bond because Brandon has an ice habit.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is back hunting in the big city of Denver, but chasing fugitives on the mainland is more dangerous than ever. So Dog decides that the crew should get pepper-ball guns, which have much better range than pepper spray.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog decides to help two of his bondsmen buddies, Dave "Red" Widhelm and "Downtown" Bobby Brown. First up is Red, who has a client, named Alvin, whose bond is $20,000. Then the team goes after Craig, a client of Bobby's whose bond is almost $70,000.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Allegre is returned and Blake's suspicions about Peter's involvement are founded; Tracy orchestrates a press campaign to ruin Krystle; learning her fiance has left the country, Fallon dashes from the hotel and is struck by a truck.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Peter DeVilbis, caught while trying to leave the country, is arrested for possession of drugs and jailed; Blake is offered a political post; Fallon regains consciousness and learns she is paralyzed.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Alexis attempts to bribe Kirby to prevent her from marrying Adam; Claudia receives another package from her late husband; Fallon remains unable to walk, until her child's life is in danger.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Krystle learns she is pregnant; Fallon suffers from painful headaches; Claudia and Steven visit Matthew's accident site in Peru; once home, however, Claudia receives a phone call from her late husband.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Alexis makes a plan to upset Blake's business deal with Rashid Ahmed; Tracy attempts to seduce Blake and is fired; Steven grows suspicious of Dex, who places a mysterious phone call to Claudia.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Dex finds Alexis with Rashid and turns to Tracy for comfort; learning the reasons behind her father's death, Kirby buys a gun; the mysterious caller turns out to be a tape-recorded message; Alexis moves ahead with her plan to ruin Blake.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Kirby learns the truth behind her father's suicide; Krystle tells a stunned Alexis of her pregnancy; Fallon and Jeff announce they will remarry. Blake is planning to attack a nation involved in the China Seas Deal.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Blake travels to Hong Kong to patch up the China Seas oil deal and learns Ahmed has left the country; Mark blackmails Alexis for $100,000, and McVane watches as he deposits the check; Kirby attempts to kill Alexis but is unsuccessful.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Alexis thwarts Blake's loan extension; Sammy Jo arrives in Denver to see her son; after quarreling with Alexis, Mark is found dead after a fall from her balcony.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Blake mortgages the mansion to raise money; Tracy tells Alexis of her affair with Dex; Alexis is questioned about Mark's death; Sammy Jo intends to obtain custody of her son; an unknown woman, full of curiosity about Alexis, checks into La Mirage.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Kirby's attempt to kill Alexis is unsuccessful, and Alexis promises to remain silent if Kirby will leave Adam; Sammy Jo reveals the culprit behind Claudia's mystery calls; Fallon is gripped with a seizure and drives off as her wedding is about to begin.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Following a serious traffic accident, Fallon mysteriously vanishes. Dex and Steven bail Alexis out of jail. Sammy Jo attempts to seduce Adam. Alexis flatters Adam by suggesting he work with her defense attorney, Warren Ballard.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Steven accuses Adam of conspiring with Sammy Jo to kidnap Danny. Blake arranges to take out a mortgage on the mansion. He little suspects Alexis has signed the note and will become the owner if he defaults.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: To secure financing for his bankrupt company, Blake arranges to see Billy Waite, a notoriously underhanded oil man. Jeff continues his search for Fallon. Impatient with the progress her lawyer is making on her defense, Alexis fires Warren Ballard.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2006, Texas real estate agent Sarah Anne Walker was found brutally murdered in a model home. Weeks later, a witness came forward who may have seen the killer. Police used forensic hypnosis to help him recall every detail of the man's appearance.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Emergency dispatch received a call from a man who said his girlfriend shot and killed herself. The autopsy revealed that the gunshot wound was not self-inflicted, and the evidence on her body would give police a golden opportunity to catch her killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A healthy young man dies mysteriously in his sleep and toxicology tests reveal a lethal dose of lidocaine in his blood. Investigators find a suicide note and presume he killed himself until a forensic linguist examines the note.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a woman disappeared without a trace, there were two possible explanations: kidnapping or murder. Careful investigation, a forensic artist and DNA profiling enabled police to find a single suspect, who was known to prey upon vulnerable women.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: When Pronto accidentally uses the Emperor's sword blaster, he can suddenly do no wrong.

programme.title: Slugterra

programme.title: Slugterra

programme.title: Di-Gata Defenders
programme.desc: Mel and Erik have eluded their sand Nomad pursuers and are hiding out in a dojo, while Mel recuperates.Seth has struck a deal with Doku, an embittered wizard who promises him the location of Nazmul's secret Keep.

programme.title: Di-Gata Defenders
programme.desc: On the run from Malco and Flinch and The Sand Nomads who have overrun the Dojo, Mel and Erik encounter Bo, a brash young stone slinger who tells them of a warrior cult competition being held in a nearby county.

programme.title: Di-Gata Defenders
programme.desc: Mel dreams of a long-lost monastery and a pure stone hidden there. Nazmul can read her dream and decides that it is Mel – the possessor of such power, whose body he must have as the host for his incorporeal being.

programme.title: Di-Gata Defenders
programme.desc: Eluding bounty hunters, the rascally Adam charms his way into the Defenders’ encampment only to steal away in the night with their pure stones.

programme.title: Di-Gata Defenders
programme.desc: Kara is still feeling the effects of the spider poison, and Mel is suffering from spontaneous and draining eruptions of psychic power, The Defenders head for the legendary Nexus, over the centuries a traditional place of healing for Di-Gata defenders.

programme.title: Di-Gata Defenders
programme.desc: Barely escaping the Nexus with their lives, the Defenders set out for the Pinnacle, an ancient Di-Gata training temple.

programme.title: Di-Gata Defenders
programme.desc: The defenders discover The Machine of Binding and Erik devises a plan to re-wire the machine to enable it to draw the pure stones to it.

programme.title: Beyblade Metal Fury
programme.desc: Gingka battles Dynamis the Guardian of the temple. Gingka seems to have chosen the wrong strategy, but admits that he was too caught up in being a legendary Blader and says that he should have been paying more attention.

programme.title: Beyblade Metal Fury
programme.desc: A Bey battle breaks out at a temple on Mist Mountain. At the end, neither side succeeds, and Kyoya declares his loyalty to no one.

programme.title: Beyblade Metal Fury
programme.desc: Gingka and his friends arrive at Beyster Island, where they have entered a tournament that has attracted a huge number of strong Bladers.

programme.title: Beyblade Metal Fury
programme.desc: As the battle of Beyster Island continues, many more bladers are knocked out of the competition.

programme.title: Beyblade Metal Fury

programme.desc: Gingka asks Chris, the newest Legendary Blader, to join him in his fight against evil, but Chris says he will join whoever pays him the most.

programme.desc: Ren's conflicting loyalties finally come to a head when he decides to turn his back on Barodius.

programme.title: LEGO Jurassic World
programme.desc: Danny dons powerful dino-mech armor to dig up Cap'n No-Beard's treasure beneath Mt. Sibo, making him more than a match for our heroes ... and a mighty allosaurus that unexpectedly joins the party!

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Dragons Rising: The Spell at the Waterfall
programme.desc: Egalt teaches the Rising Dragon to the ninja; Sora and Riyu learn Spinjitzu from Rontu; Cole reaches the Monastery with the Finders and sets off on an adventure with Zane.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Dragons Rising: To Mysterium
programme.desc: Cole, Zane and Bonzle travel to Mysterium, only to fall into Dorama's trap; Arin is frustrated with his Spinjitzu training.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Dragons Rising: Fugitives From Madness
programme.desc: Zane, Bonzle and Cole meet their creator Gandalaria. Kai is appointed the third Dragon Master. The dragon masters turn into stone sculptures as the blood moon appears in the sky. The other ninja's training ends prematurely.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: The four Ninja are snapped out of their post-hero complacency when Lord Garmadon’s son Lloyd shows up and tries to pick up where his father left off. The Ninja dismiss him as a threat, but regret that choice after Lloyd wakes up the evil snake tribe.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: Lloyd, having been kicked out of the Hynobrai snake tribe unlocks a second tribe – The Fangpyres – to help him regain control.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: After the Fangpyres join forces with the Hypnobrai, Lloyd awakens Pythor – the last remaining snake of the Anacondrai tribe.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: Lloyd moves in and tries to make nice by helping out with chores, but he just gets in the way. Pythor has awoken the Vipoids and the Constrictaurs and an all out snake war has taken over Ninjago.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: Pythor declares himself to be the destined leader who will reawaken The Great Devourer – an ancient beast who can’t be killed and will consume all of Ninjago. We find out Nya is the Samurai and Lloyd is taken prisoner by the snake tribes.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: Jay and Nya have to cut their first date in Mega-Monster Amusement Park short as the Serpentine are on their way to retrieve the first or four fang blades to be used to awaken the Great Devourer.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: The four ninja go undercover as a dance troupe and enter a talent contest in their quest to win “The Blade Cup” where one of the fang blades is hidden.

programme.title: LEGO Chima

programme.title: LEGO Chima
programme.desc: Chima is peaceful yet again. Laval and Cragger go on a joyful Speedor cruise. But the Ravens use the peace to move into Eagle Spires. The Eagles try to get rid of them, but the Ravens are very persistent. It will be up to Eris to trick them to leave.

programme.title: LEGO Chima

programme.desc: El Abuelo despierta la curiosidad en el Noruego por conocer a su padre y este le pide ayuda a Gaspar para que lo acompañe en esta misión que ha hecho como su única prioridad. Mientras tanto el Abuelo encamina a Jonathan en su despertar sexual.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Viendo la tele en la sala de su casa de repente el Abuelo y el Noruego son golpeados con una nueva idea para lucrar en un popular programa de TV. Mientras tanto Peluzín se aventaja de un descuido de Gaspar.

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo se topa de manera inesperada con su Némesis de la infancia y junto con Gaspar se embarca en una cruzada para recuperar un objeto muy preciado de manos de su archienemigo.

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego recibe una visita inesperada con una noticia que le cambiara la vida. Mientras tanto Jonathan le ayuda a Peluzín para prepararse para una prueba muy importante.

programme.desc: Una aparición religiosa se manifiesta en el baño del departamento y poco tardan el noruego y el abuelo en encontrarle una ventaja a esta situación.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: With the help of some quick gunplay by his partner Jigen, Lupin takes on the world in elaborate heists, classic car chases, and nasty explosions. Fujiko, a buxom redhead with a penchant for betrayal, always gets tangled up in Lupin's capers.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Chopper’s Rumble Ball could be the difference between life and death in the mole ballgame. Elsewhere, Sanji has trouble kicking a pretty enemy, and Vivi proposes something unthinkable.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Vivi continues preparations to blow up the palace; Zorro puts his steel to the test against a lethal blade-man; Sanji tries to overcome his inability to kick a foxy lady!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Things don’t look good for the prettiest Straw Hat. Nami’s about to tangle with a thorny adversary, and the weapon Usopp built her is only good for party tricks!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Crocodile reveals his sinister motives for attacking Alabasta, and Nami tries to end her duel with Miss Doublefinger by unleashing the Clima Tact’s ultimate weapon: a devastatingly lethal tornado!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Zoro hopes to attain a new level of strength when he fights a foe with a body made of blades. The Straw Hat sword-slinger is determined to become a man who can cut steel – or die trying.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Koza – the leader of the rebel army – finally discovers the evil mastermind behind Alabasta’s drought, but is he too late to prevent further bloodshed?

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: When Koza is mysteriously shot, the rebellion is reborn, but Vivi’s cries for a cease-fire fall on deaf ears until a long-overdue hero swoops to the rescue!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy finally discovers the secret to knocking out a sandman, but it won’t matter unless Vivi and the rest of the Straw Hats can locate the Baroque Works bomber.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: While his mates search for a bomb, Luffy narrowly survives his second scrape with Crocodile. Across town, Nico Robin strong-arms Cobra into revealing his country’s greatest secret.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: With the walls crumbling down around them, Crocodile attacks Luffy with a poisoned pirate hook. Meanwhile, Vivi draws a bead on the bombers, but can she stop them in time?

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats team up to give Vivi one last shot at disarming the bomb that threatens to destroy her city. She succeeds in cutting the fuse, but Crocodile has a backup plan.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Pell’s sacrifice spares his beloved city, but only an act of god can stop the rebellion. With Crocodile’s poison coursing through his body, Luffy musters a final attack against Alabasta’s oppressor.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Crocodile is defeated, the rain has returned to Alabasta, and Vivi’s people are eager to rebuild their kingdom. As for the Straw Hats, they have a fleet of marines breathing down their necks.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Now that the rebellion is over, Vivi must make an important decision about her future. The Straw Hats are ready to hoist the anchor, but an ambiguous villain has stolen the Going Merry!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Mr. 2 is a man of many faces, but he finally shows his true colors when the marines attack the Straw Hats. Elsewhere, Vivi has a scheme up her sleeve, and it involves Igaram wearing a dress.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and his crew watch Alabasta fade into the distance, but there’s no time for reminiscing. The marines are in hot pursuit, and there’s a stowaway aboard the Going Merry!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Fresh off their adventure Alabasta, the Straw Hats discover an isolated island where they can restock their food supply. Chopper is left to guard the ship, but he and Nico spend the afternoon exploring instead!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: When a mail-order salesman gets lost at sea, Nami finds the paper she needs to start making maps. If the Straw Hat crew can somehow manage to survive a deadly cyclone, she might actually get some use out of it!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Heavy fog leads to a close encounter of the culinary kind when Nico fishes a marine out of the drink. The aspiring chef is concerned about the quality of his curry, and Sanji is just the guy to refine his recipe!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: A break in the rain provides the perfect opportunity for Usopp to help a young girl fulfill her dream of launching the world’s largest firework.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Money troubles force Zoro to tangle with Dick the Bandit and his treacherous gang of thugs. These gun-toting outlaws are terrorizing a peaceful village, and the Straw Hat swordsman aims to stop their reign of terror!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: A barrage of Marine cannon balls forces the Straw Hats to seek refuge on an uncharted island. Once ashore, the crew encounters a strange old man living amongst a herd of goats.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Old man Zenny made a fortune lending money to scallywags, but he always dreamed of becoming a pirate himself. When the marines set out to trap the Straw Hats, the wily hermit may finally get his wish!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Zenny gets more than he bargained for when he embarks on his maiden pirate voyage. The Straw Hats may have made a friend for life, but what are they gonna do about those pesky marines?

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats stop for supplies at a harbor town plagued by a mayor who taxes anything and everything. Over lunch, Luffy and Nico befriend a kooky scientist who’s obsessed with the Rainbow Mist.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy, Usopp, Nico, and Zoro get trapped in the Rainbow Mist along with Henzo. The aging scientist is looking for answers, the Straw Hats want treasure, and the ghosts who haunt the mist want them all to leave!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and his crew search for a way out of Ape’s Concert, but the Rainbow Mist is an inescapable maze of madness. Back on shore, Nami, Chopper, and Sanji face a lifetime of hard labor for failing to pay their taxes!

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: Genites attack Tyr's wife and colony, and he discovers that he is a father - and his son may be the genetic reincarnation of Drago Mussevni.

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: With 50 parties on board, Dylan hosts the signing of the New Commonwealth charter but soon discovers there are intruders intent on stopping the signing.

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka and Tyr are taken over by the energy from a dimensional tunnel. Dylan, Trance, and Harper must save them before they destroy the ship.

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan is framed for murder and must clear his name, all while finding the pieces of a vase said to grant the owner the "blessings of the cosmos."

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: The crew rescues a group of refugees, only to discover they have been subject to government experiments and are extremely unstable.

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka's Uncle Sid runs for office in the New Commonwealth, but an assassination attempt causes the crew to act as his security.

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
