programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: The crew discovers that a rogue planet, Marduk, has been creating weapons of mass destruction.

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: A hitman by the name of the Leper is targeting the leaders of the New Commonwealth.

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: The Andromeda is haunted by a mysterious creature that comes aboard during a solar storm.

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: When a long lost love returns, Tyr disappears from the ship to protect her from an assassin.

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: Set in an alternate universe where Dylan died and Gaheris Rhade is trying to reform the Commonwealth.

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: The group that attacked the Andromeda during the first Commonwealth charter signing returns to wreak more havoc.

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: Trance runs through a number of different scenarios, trying to find one in which her crewmates don't die.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A single mother becomes a murder victim while living a double life; a web of deception, sex and murder sends detectives on a multi-year hunt to figure out who could have murdered her.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A high-speed car chase ends with a 40-year-old newlywed shot dead in front of her husband and stepdaughter; is this a robbery gone wrong, a gang ordered hit, or something more sinister.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: The quintessential girl next door is discovered brutally killed on Thanksgiving weekend; it would take investigators over a year to uncover the dark obsession that led to her murder.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A foursome, a stripper, and a biker, is just the beginning for investigators of this massage table homicide; everyone is shocked as a secret fetish for murder is revealed.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A single mother is found shot and stabbed in her kitchen; multiple suspects emerge, but the true mastermind of this murder hits closer to home than anyone expected.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: What started as a perfect marriage evolves into a threesome; after one of the participants winds up dead, the killer turns out to be someone the investigators never suspected.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: When a psychic and her adult daughter are found killed under bizarre circumstances, the list of suspects grows long as investigators discover that male escorts, blackmail, fraud and love spells all played a part in this chilling double murder.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A mom starts online dating to try and cope after an unexpected tragedy, but when she gets pulled into the underbelly of the BDSM world and then disappears, investigators spend over a year unraveling this dark mystery.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A loving grandmother from a traveling community is found brutally murdered, shocking all; investigators soon uncover a web of lies, identity theft and millions in insurance fraud that point to who killed this sweet old lady.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: When a man is shot dead in bed right next to his fiancée, detectives learn that anyone's past can come back to haunt them.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: Investigators in East Baton Rouge, La., hunt for a serial murderer who carefully carves up and cuts the bodies of his victims after death.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: When multiple victims' bodies are dumped around Louisiana's bayou area, a task force is formed to catch a killer who police believe may have strangled over 20 men.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: Police in Hartford, Conn., investigate a string of ruthless killings in the Asylum Hill area committed by a killer with a devastating mark that leaves his victims nearly unrecognizable.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: A serial sniper terrorizes the entire D.C. metro area by discreetly targeting random victims out in public and in plain sight.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: In 1990, a serial killer terrorizes the University of Florida's campus, killing five students in under four days; the Gainesville Ripper leaves behind a crime scene where all the victims have been stabbed but the females have been posed like dolls.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: In New Jersey four bodies are found dismembered, bagged, and thrown in roadside garbage cans; the "Last Call Killer" hunted his victims openly in piano bars but no one suspected he could be hiding in plain sight, working as a local nurse.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: Dallas police discover three women murdered with their eyes surgically removed; police believe they have a deranged doctor on the loose until two rookie cops find themselves on the trail of a man with a talent for taxidermy and a hatred for women.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Juan le dice a Dínora que está dispuesto a rogar con tal de obtener su libertad, ella no le cree. Hortencia ve a Ruth, piensa que es Libia, corre y da gritos, en el pueblo piensan que enloqueció.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Ruth sueña que Libia le muestra la cabaña donde tienen a Juan, sale a buscar el lugar, los hombres de Dínora la atrapan en el momento en que están cavando una tumba para enterrarlo.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Ruth y Juan toman a Dínora de rehén y huyen, pero son recapturados y llevados a la montaña para matarlos, sus hermanos merodean por los alrededores. Rosario y Armando tienen un duelo a tiros.

programme.title: Los herederos del monte
programme.desc: Julieta le revela su verdad a Juan y le anuncia el cáncer mortal del que sufre, en medio de una escena de celos para alejarlo de los besos de Paula. Emilio está preocupado por las acciones de sus hijos, sobre todo de Gaspar y José.

programme.title: Los herederos del monte
programme.desc: Juan sufre por su esposa. Los hermanos se dan cuenta de la enfermedad de Julieta. José discute con Paula, le dice que se vaya. Lupe escucha todo y le advierte a Gaspar que no confié en José. Emilio confiesa que uno de sus hijos es de su sangre.

programme.title: Los herederos del monte
programme.desc: El cáncer de Julieta separa a Juan y Paula definitivamente. El dolor de esa noticia hiere a una familia que apenas comienza su agonía. Emilio siente remordimiento por todo lo malo que hizo en su pasado y que afectó a cada uno de sus hijos.

programme.title: Los herederos del monte
programme.desc: Julieta le exige a Juan sacar a Paula de su casa, todo bajo la condición de hacer su tratamiento. José es víctima de su ambición bajo el juego de su padre. Rosario continúa cambiando por el recuerdo de su violación y se torna agresiva.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Verónica besa a Lucho y logra mantenerlo a su lado. Ante la insistencia de Alejandro, ella le dice que está comprometida con Lucho. Irene le cuenta a su hermana que Alejandro y Verónica son amantes. Max pierde el trabajo por defender a Valentina.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Ricardo recibe una llamada de Constanza y no puede contener el llanto. Una carta anónima llega a las manos de Gastón. Verónica y Lucho le alertan que se trata de una trampa. Antonia juega con Alberto y después manda a que le den una brutal golpiza.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Los aliados de Verónica la comparan con Antonia. Ricardo está desesperado por encontrar a su madre y sospecha que se esconde tras una burka en la Fortaleza. La policía encuentra a Alberto gravemente herido en plena calle. Lagarto detiene a Max.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Max tiene una coartada y Valentina la corrobora. David visita a su tío en la cárcel y se reconcilian. Verónica visita al moribundo Alberto y luego de enumerarle sus horribles crímenes, le revela su identidad. Constanza se abre ante su hijo.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Ruth y Juan toman a Dínora de rehén y huyen, pero son recapturados y llevados a la montaña para matarlos, sus hermanos merodean por los alrededores. Rosario y Armando tienen un duelo a tiros.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Armando llega al hospital con un balazo en el pecho, mientras Juan y Ruth hacen el último esfuerzo por sobrevivir. Antes de huir, Dínora llama a Norma para decirle que Juan no regresará jamás.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Una caravana de rescate recorre el territorio en medio de la noche, las sospechas de que Dínora es la culpable del secuestro son corroboradas al hallar a Juan y a Ruth en un camino solitario.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez decide to keep Wednesday and Pugsley home from school after Morticia sees the fairy tales they have to read. When the truant officer comes to investigate, he is shocked at what he finds.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia calls a psychiatrist after she fears Pugsley is becoming normal after he abandons his pet octopus for a puppy and is seen wearing a Boy Scout uniform, playing with a baseball bat, and helping an old lady cross the street.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester, who has become lonely, convinces Gomez and Morticia that it is time for him to find a bride. He decides to put an ad in the newspaper, looking for love. But things go awry when a door-to-door saleswoman comes by.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Election fever grips the Addams household, as Gomez (John Astin) supports the council candidate whose campaign promise is to drain the town's disgusting bogs. Morticia (Carolyn Jones), who likes "the lovely bogs," labels the candidate an extremist.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley and Wednesday start a row at a party when their gift of a tarantula upsets Harold, the birthday boy. Harold's parents insist that the Addams children lack breeding and, therefore, are no longer allowed to play with their son.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: After Pugsley befriends Gorgo, a circus gorilla, Gorgo decides to follow Pugsley and Gomez home, where is accepted as one of the family. But Gorgo gives Morticia's tea guests, the Ladies League members, quite a shock.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: A pair of bank robbers are welcomed as Halloween trick-or-treaters by Morticia and Gomez. The creepy atmosphere of the house, Morticia's smoldering holiday punch, and Lurch's ominous presence impel the crooks to abandon their plans.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Lionel Barker, a former suitor of Morticia's, shows up, Gomez is jealous. But he's soon calmed when he learns that Barker is after Mildred, the new maid. The Addamses then discover that Barker is a con man--after Mildred's money, not her love.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Newlyweds move in next door. But the honeymoon loses its tranquility when Uncle Fester enters their house through a tunnel and they flee in terror at the sight of Lurch, Grandmama sharpening her ax, and Morticia and Gomez bathing the octopus.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The family faces a crisis when Wednesday packs her spider and runs away (after being scolded for playing with Uncle Fester's TNT). When they try to file a missing person report, a detective is anxious to retire early due to their story.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Official visitors from an unfriendly nation receive the shock of their lives when they decide to exploit the Addams Family as an average uncultured family. The visitors are shaken up by Morticia's carnivorous plants among other things.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's cousin, Melancholia, wants to marry Clarence P. Harvey after most of her marital prospects have joined the Foreign Legion. Clarence recoils when Melancholia puts on a campaign to win him, backed by Morticia, Gomez and Clarence's boss.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch becomes a veritable gazelle when he takes dancing lessons at Gomez and Morticia's suggestion after he admits to being a wallflower at social functions. Each member of the Addams Family teaches Lurch a different step.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandmama's paintings leave an art critic speechless, so Gomez sends for his friend, Sam Picasso, to teach Grandmama to paint in the abstract. The starving artist ignores Grandmama's and Morticia's work as he eats and paints.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Rockland Cartright III is a beatnik who crashes his motorbike into a tree and recuperates at the Addams house. Each regards the other as an oddity, although the family learns to appreciate certain aspects of Rockland's life.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Mr. Briggs, the postman, is hired by the government to do undercover work in the Addams house. While pretending to be a stamp collector, he investigates rumors that coded radio messages are being sent from the house.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch's tiny fire-eating mother visits and demands that Lurch's employers wait on her boy hand-and-foot after Lurch leads her to believe that it's his house. Lurch revels in the unexpected attention he gets from Morticia and Gomez.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester's electrical output fails abruptly. Should they call a doctor or an electrician to bring Fester back? Morticia prescribes a bowl of porcupine mold, and both she and Gomez agree that long exposure to moon rays would be beneficial.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The family would like to vacation on the moon, but the billion-dollar travel cost is slightly prohibitive. Uncle Fester volunteers $21.13 and Morticia, using Gomez's new supercomputer, suggests placing a $2,000 bet on the daily double horse race.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Cousin Itt is advocated as curator of the local zoo. Gomez uses his influence with Park Commissioner Fisk (guest star Alan Reed) to promote Itt for the job, but the zookeepers are convinced the Addamses' cousin should be confined to a cage.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandmama (Blossom Rock) is hauled off to jail for setting up a fortune-telling booth in the Addamses' living room. Gomez (John Astin) volunteers to act as attorney, and the court session becomes a shambles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez (John Astin) loses his memory after hitting his head; he fails to recognize Morticia (Carolyn Jones) and says the house looks like a condemned museum. The Addamses take turns hitting Gomez on the head trying to help him regain his memory.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Thing disappears from his box. Failing to find a single trace of Thing, Gomez (John Astin) conducts an investigation--with all members of the household under suspicion. Also starring Carolyn Jones, Jackie Coogan, and Ted Cassidy.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester applies for a job as an insurance salesman with the same company which is threatening to cancel the Addamses' policy (because Fester keeps blowing things up). Fester convinces the company interviewer that he is qualified for the job.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch becomes inconsolable when Gomez donates the family antique harpsichord to a collector. Gomez and Morticia offer Lurch a balalaika and a set of drums. When this proves unsatisfactory, Gomez and Fester decide to build a new harpsichord.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Morticia hears the stock market has crashed, she assumes that Gomez has been financially wiped out and rallies the family to help make money. Morticia gives lessons, Lurch and Fester run an escort service, and the kids run a poison drink stand.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: While enjoying a moonlight picnic and snail hunt, the Addams Family is mistaken for Martians by uniformed investigators from Mysterious Space Objects Headquarters. In turn, Gomez (John Astin) and the clan regard their inquisitors with suspicion.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: In a tight race to the mat, teams row and swim to the Pit Stop located on a boat, where the losers walk the plank and are eliminated.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Racers embark on a gut wrenching, 40-foot plunge and teams make a difficult decision when faced with a double U-turn.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The final four teams race for a spot in the finale and a high-stakes foot race to the mat will mark the end of one more team's journey.

programme.desc: Racers travel to Zanzibar, Tanzania where teams build and deliver desks to a local school. Also, tensions rise when teams face a blind double U-turn, and one team's Race may be in jeopardy when they misplace their passports.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: A previously played U-turn causes friction between two teams in Tanzania.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Racers take on a record setting Roadblock by helping build a 13-story bonfire in Norway.

programme.title: The Amazing Race

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Teams race through Venice, Italy where one team reaches a breaking point in a frantic search for a water taxi.

programme.desc: While driving to the Detour, one team ends up going the wrong way, and a surprising U-turn causes friction between racers.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: An extreme fear of heights paralyzes one Racer at a Roadblock when faced with bungee jumping 240 feet from a bridge into the Corinth Canal.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Teams battle the scorching heat while transporting shrimp baskets for one mile to a local fisherman, and one Racer approaches their breaking point during the exhausting Roadblock.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Forensic psychologists delve into the minds of serial killers, explaining why, most often, they can be a friendly neighbor or the tenacious co-worker – the one who hides his or her dark side better than anyone else.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Black Boxes: Little evidence is left after an airplane takes a deadly plunge from the sky. Investigators' best hope for an answer comes from the flight data recorder known as a “black box.”

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: George Orwell's concept of Big Brother remains in the realm of fiction. But as technology becomes more a part of our lives, it's becoming increasingly more difficult to make a move without leaving behind an electronic trace.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: In criminal investigations, a simple clue can provide the missing link by placing a suspect at a crime scene. Dirt left on shoes, tires or clothes, or even a tiny piece of plastic can pinpoint a crime scene.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Drug trafficking has spawned a violent and deadly criminal underground. It's providing a challenge to forensic investigators devoted to cracking drug rings.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Philadelphia's Vidocq Society, named after an 18th Century French detective, is one of the world's most unusual crime-solving organizations.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Sometimes, the cause of death does not match the scene of the crime. When an untraceable poison is used to commit murder, homicide detectives turn to forensic toxicologists to follow a killer's tracks and expose a toxic death.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Investigators rely on forensic odontology to identify a body from a single tooth and to catch two brutal killers from their bite marks.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: No matter how chaotic or how clean a crime scene appears to be, the culprit is bound to leave something telling behind. Occasionally, it's nothing more than a fingerprint or shoe tread. Sometimes that's all that's needed.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Some people do get away with murder, at least for a while. Flush with their success, serial killers murder again and again. But each time they kill, they leave behind a few more clues, which ultimately lead to their undoing.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Forensic Entomology: Bugs have roamed the earth for 250 million years, but their intimate association with death is just now coming to life.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Forensic Sculpting: Forensic sculptors retrieve people from oblivion. Using clay and an intricate knowledge of anatomy, forensic arts place a face on an unidentified skull, recreating the victim's likeness, which often leads to his name.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Fingerprinting: The identification Division of the FBI relies on fingerprints as one of the most effective ways to identify criminals.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: In New York, an ambitious college student has her whole life ahead of her, until she crosses the path of a killer. It's a random murder, the hardest kind to solve.

programme.desc: Aaron, Carol, Lydia y Jerry van a las ruinas de Hilltop en busca de herramientas. El grupo de Eugene se somete a la orientación del Commonwealth. Maggie y Negan atraviesan el bosque. Judith y el resto de niños se enfrentan a los adolescentes.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Connie y Virgil se esconden en una casa ocupada por misteriosas criaturas, en su afan de escaparse de los caminantes. Pope pone a prueba la lealtad de Daryl hacia los Reapers con una misión controvertida. Kelly deja Alexandria para buscar a Connie.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Maggie y Elijah aprenden nuevas tácticas de supervivencia de Negan. El grupo de Eugene quitan a los caminantes para pagar sus multas. Yumiko hace una entrevista para un trabajo importante. Daryl descubre más sobre Leah.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Los Reapers defienden Meridian del asalto de una horda de zombis. Pope cree que Maggie es la responsable del ataque, y los habitantes de Alexandria tratan de proteger las defensas de la ciudad, destrozadas por una violenta tormenta.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl, Maggie, Gabriel, Negan y Elijah luchan contra los Segadores por comida. Aaron debe sobrevivir a una tormenta.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: El grupo celebra Halloween en el interior de la Mancomunidad. Daryl y Rosita se someten a un entrenamiento militar dirigido por Mercer, mientras Carol investiga el problema de salud de Ezekiel.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Eugene busca a Stephanie, que desapareció misteriosamente. Connie investiga al soldado Davis. Carol ayuda a Lance a investigar una comunidad que está extorsionando a la Mancomunidad por dinero.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Aaron y Maggie se encuentran a la governadora Pamela Milton mientras recorre Alexandria, Oceanside y Hilltop. Ezekiel tiene suerte durante un control de rutina. Eugene procesa la historia de Max.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Maggie, Lydia y Elijah ayudan a un extraño de otra comunidad llamada Riverbend. Se encuentran con Aaron, quien les cuenta sobre una misión en la que se embarcó con Gabriel como emisarios de la Mancomunidad.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Maggie, Lydia y Elijah ayudan a Aaron y a Gabriel en una misión de rescate. En medio del caos, Negan vigila a Hershel. Sebastian fuerza a Daryl y Rosita a realizar un atraco.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Hornsby obliga a Daryl y a sus tropas a enfrentarse contra Maggie en Hilltop. Tras un angustioso atraco, Rosita consigue que Connie, Kelly, Eugene y Max investiguen a los Milton. Ezekiel ayuda a los pacientes del hospital.

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Vinny Pazienza vs Roberto Duran 1
programme.desc: On June 25th, 1994 Vinny Pazienza faced Roberto Duran for the first time at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas in a 12 round bout Pazienza went down in round 5 and Duran won this fight by unanimous decsion.

programme.title: Shakur Stevenson vs Oscar Valdez
programme.desc: On April 30th, 2022, Shakur Stevenson fought Oscar Valdez for the WBC and WBO World Super Featherweight Titles at MGM Grand in Las Vegas. Shakur put on a brilliant performance, outmatching Valdez on his way to a clear unanimous decision victory.

programme.title: Shakur Steveson vs Felix Caraballo
programme.desc: On June 9th, 2020, a young Shakur Stevenson fought Felix Caraballo in a super featherweight bout in The Bubble at MGM Grand. After knocking down Caraballo in rounds 1 and 6, Stevenson would get the KO with a devastating body shot in round six.

programme.title: Shane Mosley vs Antonio Margarito
programme.desc: On January 24th, 2009 Shane Mosley and Antonio Margarito fought for WBA Super World Welterweight title at the Staples Center in Los Angeles with what was supposed to be a 12 round bout only went nine resulting in a victory for Mosley.

programme.title: Shane Mosley vs Oscar De La Hoya
programme.desc: On June 17th, 2000 Shane Mosley faced Oscar De la Hoya for the first time for the IBA and WBC World welterweight titles at the Staples Center in Los Angeles the bout went a full 12 rounds ending with a split decision win for Mosley.

programme.title: Sugar Ray Leonard vs Thomas Hearns
programme.desc: On September 16th, 1981 Sugar Ray Leonard faced Thomas Hearns for the WBA and WBC World welterweight titles at the Caesars Palace in Las Vegas resulting in a win by technical knockout for Leonard and went on to be the 1981 Fight of the year.

programme.title: Sugar Ray Leonard vs Wilfred Benitez
programme.desc: On November 30th, 1979 Sugar Ray Leonard fought Wilfred Benitez for the WBC World Welterweight title at Caesars Palace in Las Vegas that went 15 rounds but ended in technical knockout giving the victory to Leonard.

programme.title: Terence Crawford vs Andre Gorges
programme.desc: On April 14th, 2012 Terence Crawford fought Andre Gorges at the Mandalay Bay in Las Vegas in a bout that was set for 6 round and lasted 5 with a win by knockout victory for Crawford.

programme.title: Terence Crawford vs Jose Benavidez Jr
programme.desc: On October 13th, 2018, Terence Crawford fought Jose Benavidez Jr for the WBO World Welterweight Title in Omaha, Nebraska. In a dominant performance, Crawford showed out in front of his hometown, delivering a TKO in the final round.

programme.title: Terence Crawford vs Julius Indongo
programme.desc: On August 19th, 2017 Terence Crawford fought Julius Indongo for the IBF, WBA, WBC and WBO World Super Lightweight titles at the Pinnacle Bank Arena in Lincoln the bout ended in the third round by knockout securing the victory for Crawford.

programme.title: Terence Crawford vs Kell Brook
programme.desc: On November 14th, 2020 Terence Crawford battled Kell Brook for the WBO World Welterweight title in The Bubble at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas resulting in a fourth round technical knockout victory for Crawford.

programme.title: Terence Crawford vs Shawn Porter
programme.desc: On November 20th, 2021, Terence Crawford fought Shawn Porter for the WBO World Welterweight Title at the Mandalay Bay in Las Vegas. In a very close fight, Crawford turned it up and put on the pressure late, delivering a TKO in the 10th round.

programme.title: Terence Crawford vs Thomas Dulorme
programme.desc: On April 18th, 2015, Terence Crawford fought Thomas Dulorme for the WBO World Super Lightweight Title in Arlington, Texas. Putting on the pressure and showing his aggressive style, Crawford scored three knockdowns in the sixth round to get the TKO.

programme.title: Terence Crawford vs Viktor Postol
programme.desc: On July 23rd, 2016, Terence Crawford fought Viktor Postol for the WBO and WBC World Super Lightweight Titles at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas. Scoring two knockdowns, Crawford dominated the fight, earning a much deserved unanimous decision victory.

programme.title: Terence Crawford vs Yuriorkis Gamboa
programme.desc: On June 28th, 2014, Terence Crawford fought Yuriorkis Gamboa for the WBO Lightweight Title at Century Link Center in Omaha. In Top Rank's 2014 Fight of the Year, Terence Crawford shined in front of his hometown, stopping Gamboa in the ninth round.

programme.title: Thomas Hearns vs Juan Domingo Roldan
programme.desc: On October 29th, 1987 Thomas Hearns faced Juan Domingo Roldan for the vacant WBC World Middleweight title at the Las Vegas Hilton the 12 round bout went only 4 rounds ending with a knockout by Hearns securing the victory.

programme.title: Thomas Hearns vs Roberto Duran
programme.desc: On June 15th, 1984 Thomas Hearns fought Roberto Duran for WBC World Super Welterweight title at Caesars Palace in Las Vegas that resulted in a technical knockout victory in the second round by Hearns.

programme.desc: The tables are turned and the mountain's underdogs get their chance. Jimmy Smith finds the holy grail of underwater logs when he attempts to pull a dock out of the water. The men of Pihl Logging battle the biggest timber of their careers.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Dead weight must be shed. Inexperienced hook tender Jesse Browning, junior pilot Steve Smith and greenhorn Brad Hewitt all have their heads on the chopping block.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: New faces are welcomed to the fraternity of men known as Ax Men. Rygaard and Conner Aviation hope their new greenhorns fare better than the last class. At Pihl, a missing cutter sends the crew on a search mission.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: It's Decepticon versus Decepticon when triple changers Astrotrain and Blitzwing decide to seize power. Using a molecule-freezing device to take Megatron and Starscream out of the picture, the two are free to lead how they see fit.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: An S.O.S. seeking help from the Autobots arrives from the desperate people of the planet Traal, who have been forced into slave labor by Deceptitron. Seaspray arrives with the Autobots rescue team, and discovers much more than he was planning on.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: Part 1 of 2. Megatron creates a powerful strike team, but his Stunticons lack sentience and independent thought. This leads the Decepticons deep into the heart of Cybertron to steal Vector Sigma, the computer that brought life to those on the planet.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: Part 2 of 2. Attempting to even the odds against the Stunticons, the Autobots create the Aerialbots to join in the battle against Megatron, who plans to use Vector Sigma to turn the Earth into a metal planet like Cybertron!

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: Robots are truly in disguise when the Autobots pose as Stunticons to uncover Megatron's latest plan involving the thefts of some high-profile materials.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: The Autobots participate in a charity road race to watch over an experimental race car—a car made of a special type of material Megatron needs to complete his latest doomsday weapon, a weather-dominating device capable of mass destruction.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: The Autobots participate in a charity road race to watch over an experimental race car - a car made of a special type of material Megatron needs to complete his latest doomsday weapon, a weather-dominating device capable of mass destruction.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: The Aerialbots are thrown back in time to Cybertron's Golden Age. While there, they learn the truth of Megatron's early treachery as well as witness firsthand the creation of Cybertron's greatest hero, Optimus Prime!

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: Megatron becomes infected with cosmic rust, a metal-consuming plague. When Autobot scientist Perceptor is forced to find a cure for Megatron, the entire Autobot civilization is again put at risk of extinction. But an Autobot invention may save them...

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: After a failed attempt on Megatron's life, Starscream is banished to a deserted island. There he finds the remains of World War II battle vehicles and decides to use them as the basis for his own attack team, the Combaticons.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: United as “Bruticus,” the Combaticons are virtually unstoppable. They plan to pull the Earth into the Sun to eliminate all of their enemies at once. The only hope is for the Autobots and Decepticons to join forces to take Bruticus down!

programme.title: Transformers: Robots in Disguise
programme.desc: When Stunticon Drag Strip steals a powerful Cybertronian artifact known as a Gravitic Adjuster, the Bee Team gives chase but are caught in an explosion that once again fuses them into the Ultra Bee Team Combiner (UBTC).

programme.title: Transformers: Robots in Disguise
programme.desc: A string of mysterious explosives thefts leave the Bee Team flummoxed, but Strongarm is convinced that there's a criminal mastermind at work.

programme.title: Transformers: Robots in Disguise
programme.desc: DRIFT's former mentor SHADOW RAKER, a Fagin-like thief, has come to Earth to reclaim what he believes to be rightfully his — JETSTORM and SLIPSTREAM!

programme.title: Transformers: Robots in Disguise
programme.desc: After Fixit's latest attempt at combining the team, the Autobots ends up swapping bodies! They then discover that the Stunticons have entered the local Grand Prix assuming that whomever winswillbe crowned the literal "ruler of the roads."

programme.title: Transformers: Robots in Disguise

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Psycho Sister Razor has her debut match against Faith The Lioness. Plus, following the unprecedented Triple Threat Match, the most prestigious prize in women’s wrestling, the WOW World Championship Title, is decided tonight!

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: The Norwegian Nightmare, Nikki Krampus makes her long-awaited debut. Beaten in a back alley, Keta Rush seeks revenge against her assailant The Dagger. But Keta soon finds that to succeed she will have to fight off the more than just The Dagger.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: A new Champion in WOW is coming to terms with the fact the bullseye of her competitors is now squarely focused on her. Havok, The Monster Of Madness emerges as a threat to the WOW roster.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Dedicated to her ambition of never quitting, Stephy Slays demonstrates perseverance in an extraordinary match against The Disciplinarian. The smart ending will be unforgettable. Meanwhile, Tessa Blanchard takes her biggest risk since joining WOW.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: The Born Legend, Tessa Blanchard is the new WOW World Champion, and The Beast, Jungle Grrrl, and Havok The Monster Of Madness have lined up to challenge the Champion. A Triple Threat Number One Contender Match will decide who will wrestle Tessa Blanchard.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Tessa Blanchard seemingly conspires with World’s Greatest Attorney, Sophia Lopez to handpick her Championship opponent ...WOW’s newest competitor, Mexico’s high flying Luchadora Serpentine.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Foes Jungle Grrrl and The Beast are forced to put aside their differences to battle The Monsters of Madness, Havok, and Hazard. Can the two animals of the ring coexist long enough to secure victory? The Tag Team Championship Series continues.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: The animals of the ring, The Beast and Jungle Grrrl battle to determine dominance. Meanwhile, WOW World Champion Tessa Blanchard seizes an opportunity to settle a score.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: After months of being bullied, Stephy Slays finally gets her shot at revenge against The Governor’s Daughter, Abilene Maverick. The Tag Team Championship continues when The Monsters of Madness battle The Dixie Darlings, Jolene, and Jolynn.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Champion Tessa Blanchard and The Greatest Attorney in the World, Sophia Lopez conspire In an attempt to derail The Beast’s path to The WOW World Championship Title by placing The Norweigen Nightmare, Nikki Krampus in her way.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Anticipation builds as Jungle Grrrl gets a rematch against The Beast to determine the rightful contender to the WOW World Championship. To ensure a fair outcome, Champion Tessa Blanchard has been barred from ringside.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Jungle Grrrl calls out The Born Legend, Tessa Blanchard for her Championship Match. With her back against the well, Tessa is forced to get creative and strikes a deal with The Fabulous Lana Star. Will The Fabulous One help Tessa Blanchard or turn on her?

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: The Beast calls out The Fabulous Lana Star for costing her a shot at The WOW World Championship. And Jungle Grrrl finally battles The Born Legend, Tessa Blanchard for the WOW World Championship in The Main Event.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai has rebounded from her previous loss to Joey to become a better duelist. Has Yugi learned from his loss to Kaiba, or is the emotional defeat still weighing on his heart? The answer is in the cards!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey searches for the card that permits him to enter the final battle, not realizing Bandit Keith has stolen it. As he struggles to accept the fact that Serenity will be blind forever, he receives help from a new friend!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Bandit Keith's Machine deck forces Joey to take the defensive, Joey mimics Keith's battle strategy to metalize his Red-Eyes Black Dragon! Is victory assured, or does the cheater Bandit Keith literally have one last card up his sleeve?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey challenges Yugi for the right to face Pegasus. In a battle between friends, a fierce match ensues between the two people who know each other's strategies and cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is shocked as Joey uses the Time Wizard card on him. It's the very same card Yugi gave Joey as a sign of friendship!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi prepares for the ultimate battle against Pegasus with the souls of Grandpa, Kaiba, and Mokuba on the line.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus punishes Yugi using the same Toon Deck and mind-reading abilities he used on Kaiba. As Pegasus turns Yugi's monsters against him, Yugi loses the will to battle. Will Pegasus capture Yugi's soul into a card, just like Kaiba?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has found a counter to Pegasus's mind-reading ability: Yugi switches back and forth between his two souls! Yugi is able to destroy Pegasus's Toon World, but the duel has just only begun. The next level of the deadly Shadow Game is about to start!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi crumples under the power of the Shadow Game. His friends yell desperate encouragement, but their voices cannot penetrate the sphere of darkness. Yugi's chance at victory is slipping away, as is his life!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus summons Relinquished, a fearsome monster that can consume Yugi's Duel Monsters! Yugi counters with… Kuriboh?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi meets a mysterious Egyptian named Shadi who enters Yugi's mind with the Millennium Key. What are these Millennium Items, and do they hold the answer to the mystery behind the Shadow Games?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends return from the Duelist Kingdom only to meet a young girl named Rebecca who demands that Grandpa return Blue-Eyes White Dragon to her.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rebecca mistakenly believes that Grandpa stole the Blue-Eyes White Dragon from her grandfather. Yugi must defend the Blue-Eyes White Dragon to teach her that it's not the power of the cards, but the heart that's in them that counts.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The two-faced Board of Directors of Kaiba Corporation trap Kaiba inside a virtual reality game. Mokuba recruits Yugi and Joey to free Kaiba from this ultimate game where losing equals death!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The quest for Kaiba continues with a little help from… Mai? But can YUGI and friends adapt to a virtual world where the rules and strategies keep changing every step of the way?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends rescue Kaiba, but they are still stuck in the game! The only exit is past a Five-Headed Dragon, but in the difficult duel, Joey, Mokuba, and Mailose all their life points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Duke Devlin defeats Joey and humiliates him in public, forcing Yugi to challenge Duke to a duel. However, this will not be a Duel Monsters duel, but a new game named Dungeon Dice Monsters!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In exchange for Joey's freedom, Yugi agrees to give up Duel Monsters forever if he loses. Unfamiliar with the rules, Yugi gets off to a rough start.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi uses his innate gaming skills to turn the tables on Duke, but Duke has one more rule to mention: All creatures take up territory on the grid-like board. With no room to summon any new monsters, Yugi's position is helpless!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Duke's all-powerful Orogoth The Relentless dices Yugi's entire cadre of monsters into shreds, Yugi only has one turn left before he loses all his heart points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: An arcane fortune teller steals the Millennium Puzzle and Yugi must defeat him in a duel to win it back.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The mysterious menace controlling Bandit Keith shatters the Millennium Puzzle into pieces before setting the dueling arena ablaze. Can Yugi put the Millennium Puzzle back together and save the spirit before the entire room is engulfed in flames?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of Duel Monsters is revealed. Using the magic of the Millennium Necklace, Egyptian historian Ishizu Ishtar shows Kaiba how Duel Monsters was played millenniums ago.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The spirit of the Millennium Puzzle realizes that his memories of ancient Egypt have faded, but Tea helps him uncover the mysteries of his past.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi learns that he was a powerful Pharaoh who saved the world five thousand years ago, and he must now save the world again.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey is cornered by a group of sinister Rare Hunters who force Joey into a duel. If he loses, the Rare Hunters get his precious Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's time to master new rules and monsters; let the Battle City Tournament commence! In the first duel of the tournament, Yugi challenges the Rare Hunter to win back Joey's Red-Eyes Black Dragon.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: When Sam admits she has a crush on a boy at school, Carly teaches Sam how to entice him by acting more girly. Meanwhile, Spencer is convinced that a girl likes him because of his tuxedo, so he starts wearing it all the time.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: When Carly's old friend Missy moves back to Seattle, Sam believes Missy is trying to replace her as Carly's best friend.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: When Carly, Sam, and Freddie lose the iCarly URL to Nevel, he demands Carly kiss him if she wants their URL back. Meanwhile, Spencer has fun with the two hundred pillows he accidentally ordered.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: When Sam and Freddie both win a contest for the best locker in school, they are forced to share the same locker. Meanwhile, Carly asks Spencer to give her art lessons.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Carly, Sam, and Freddie present iCarly Awards for best user-generated content, giving the awards to the winners live on the web show. Spencer enlists European swimsuit models to help him make the awards statuettes.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Freddie tries to prove that Melanie, Sam's twin sister, is just Sam in disguise. Meanwhile, when Carly tutors Spencer's nemesis, Chuck, Spencer tries to convince her that Chuck is evil.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: 13-year-old Carly Shay and her friends, Sam and Freddie, create a homemade Web show called iCarly. With Freddie behind the camera and Carly and Sam hosting the show, you never know what to expect!

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: When Sam accidentally reveals to Carly that she and Freddie shared a secret kiss, Carly confronts them both about why they never told her about it. Meanwhile, Spencer goes to prison to teach an art class to convicts.

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: Cat convinces Sam to participate in a texting competition; Dice tries to avoid an old friend.

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: Gwen and Ruby return and, while pretending to be friendly, try to drive a wedge between Sam and Cat.

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: Sam, Dice and Goomer go to a mixed-martial arts fight, leaving Cat at home to study; Sam's motorcycle goes missing; Cat loses her memory.

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: Dice enlists the help of Sam and Cat to convince Goomer's mother that Goomer is a high school teacher.

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: Sam and Cat make a commercial for their business that features Dice's dog; a family claims that Dice's dog belongs to them.

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: Sam opens a safe in her bedroom and discovers a tunnel leading to a secret room; Cat films herself for 24 hours.

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: Sam and Cat are hired to baby-sit a doll on Halloween; Cat thinks she may have turned Dice into a monkey.

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: When Sam and Cat watch an accident-prone boy, they are determined to show him a good time while keeping him out of harm's way.

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: Cat plays a trick on Sam using a pair of twins that they are a babysitting; Sam retaliates with a prank on Cat.

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: Sam and Cat are ordered to rename their babysitting business because it is too similar to a television show from the 1970s.

programme.title: Victorious: Tori Fixes Beck & Jade
programme.desc: Beck wants to ask a girl out but is worried about Jade's reaction, so Tori and Andre attempt to get Jade a date to even the playing field. Robbie works to remove a butterfly stuck in Cat's ear.

programme.title: Victorious: Robbie Sells Rex
programme.desc: Mason Thornesmith's bratty 12-year-old kid wants to buy Rex from Robbie. Meanwhile, a masked flour thrower is on the loose in Hollywood Arts.

programme.title: Victorious: The Bad Roommate
programme.desc: Andre stays with Tori to work on a song for class. They quickly find they aren't the best roommates. Jade discovers an unflattering picture of herself on the internet, and conspires to take it down.

programme.title: Victorious: Victori-Yes
programme.desc: Sikowitz challenges the students to say yes to everything for one week. The gang agrees, and they soon find themselves out of their respective comfort zones.

programme.title: Victorious: Brain Squeezers
programme.desc: Tori is selected to be the team captain for a new game show, Brain Squeezers. She has to choose 3 teammates to compete with her and quickly becomes overwhelmed by requests from the gang.

programme.title: Victorious: Star-Spangled Tori
programme.desc: When Tori gets invited to sing the national anthem at a televised basketball game, she worries she'll forget the lyrics, but ends up in a much more embarrassing encounter with the team's mascot.

programme.title: Victorious: One Thousand Berry Balls
programme.desc: Andre gets Tori a job at a frozen yogurt stand, but work may keep them from performing at the Hollywood Arts Cowboy Luau. Robbie wants to ask Cat to the luau, but asks someone else, making Cat jealous.

programme.title: Victorious: The Slap Fight
programme.desc: Tori and the gang compete to see who can get the most followers on The Slap. But when they get caught up in the competition, they neglect their schoolwork and their friendships.

programme.title: Victorious: Tori Goes Platinum
programme.desc: Tori wins a contest to sing the opening number at a big music awards show, but the producer wants to totally change her look and behavior. Tori agrees, but finds that she doesn't like her new image.

programme.title: Victorious: Freak the Freak Out
programme.desc: Tori's friends sing at a local karaoke club and end up competing with a pair of stuck-up girls who are regular performers there. Competing with those girls proves to be more difficult than they expect, since one of the girls' father owns the club.
